servers.name: ClinicalTrials
servers.description: Access to the ClinicalTrials.gov database of clinical studies

hints.nct: Use nctId parameter directly in study queries

servers.name: OpenTargets
servers.description: Access to OpenTargets genetics and drug discovery data

hints.ensembl_gene: Primary identifier for target queries - use directly
hints.uniprot_accession: Requires conversion to Ensembl gene ID first

servers.name: Entrez
servers.description: NCBI Entrez system for accessing a variety of biological databases

hints.pmid: Use directly in PubMed database queries
hints.ncbi_gene: Use directly in gene database queries
hints.pdb: Search structure database with PDB ID
hints.doi: Search PubMed with DOI to find linked publications

servers.name: CIViC
servers.description: Clinical Interpretation of Variants in Cancer database

hints.ensembl_gene: Search variants and evidence by Ensembl gene ID
hints.pmid: Evidence items reference PMIDs for source publications

servers.name: DataCite
servers.description: DataCite PID Graph - resolve DOIs and discover related research outputs, authors, funders, and organizations

hints.doi: Resolve DOI to get full metadata including authors, funders, and related works
hints.orcid: Search for researcher's publications and datasets by ORCID
hints.ror: Search for organization's research outputs by ROR ID
hints.crossref_funder: Find all works funded by a specific funder

hints.pdb: Use entry_id parameter directly for structure queries

hints.ensembl_gene: Use for gene-level queries in cancer genomics data

hints.chembl: Search drug-gene interactions by ChEMBL compound ID
hints.drugbank: Search drug-gene interactions by DrugBank ID

hints.pdb: Query zinc binding sites by PDB structure ID

hints.ensembl_gene: Can map Ensembl gene ID to UniProt accession

servers.name: PubMed
servers.description: Anthropic-hosted PubMed MCP server for biomedical literature search and retrieval

hints.pmid: Use PMID directly for article retrieval and citation data
hints.doi: Search by DOI to find linked PubMed articles
hints.pmc: Access full-text articles via PMC ID when available

servers.name: NPI Registry
servers.description: US National Provider Identifier Registry - healthcare provider lookup, validation, and search

hints.npi: Use NPI number directly for provider lookup and validation

servers.name: ICD-10 Codes
servers.description: ICD-10 diagnosis and procedure code lookup, search, validation, and hierarchy navigation

hints.icd10: Use ICD-10 code directly for lookup, validation, or hierarchy queries

servers.name: CMS Coverage
servers.description: Medicare coverage policies - National and Local Coverage Determinations, billing articles, and contractor info

hints.hcpcs: Use HCPCS code for SAD exclusion list and coverage searches
hints.ncd_id: Use NCD document ID to retrieve specific National Coverage Determinations
hints.lcd_id: Use LCD document ID to retrieve specific Local Coverage Determinations

servers.name: Clinical Trials (DeepSense)
servers.description: ClinicalTrials.gov data with eligibility matching, endpoint analysis, and investigator search

hints.nct: Use NCT number to retrieve detailed trial information

servers.name: ChEMBL
servers.description: Chemical compound database - 2.4M+ compounds with bioactivity, mechanisms, and ADMET data

hints.chembl: Use ChEMBL ID directly for compound or target lookup
hints.ensembl_gene: Search targets by Ensembl gene ID

servers.name: bioRxiv
servers.description: bioRxiv/medRxiv preprint server - 260K+ preprints across biology and medicine

hints.doi: Use DOI to retrieve specific preprint details
hints.ror: Search preprints by funder ROR ID (e.g., NIH: '021nxhr62')

servers.name: Scholar Gateway
servers.description: Peer-reviewed Wiley journals with verifiable DOI citations

hints.doi: Access full-text from Wiley's peer-reviewed journal collection

servers.name: BioRender
servers.description: Scientific templates and icons for research visualizations

servers.name: Hugging Face
servers.description: ML models and datasets including bioinformatics tools (protein structure, genomics)
